@NYGovCuomo Agreed otherwise send them this bill https://t.co/Oechkga3Kr WASHINGTON: A 70-year-old American man who nearly died of Covid-19 has been billed a heart-stopping $1.1 million for his 
hospital expenses, the Seattle Times reported Saturday
